about_the_game:
Let me invite you to explore a world woven from the threads of reality.

Here, us, the Archons, my creations, rule over their unique realms, shaping and disorting them according to their desires.

But beware - this is no mere adventure. Every choice, every alliance, will echo through the system, altering its delicate balance. 

Enter the System of Epitome and strive to become an Archon.

In Epitome, NPCs aren't just background characters—they're dynamic individuals powered by advanced AI who adapt to your choices, shaping the narrative as you explore.

Every decision you make, whether good or bad, sends ripples through the world. Choose not to help an NPC in need, and you might face unforeseen consequences down the road. Offer your assistance, and you could unlock secret alliances, rare rewards, or even new challenges. Your actions don't just influence how NPCs see you—they shape how the entire world evolves.

Thanks to AI, the interaction possibilities are endless. You can:

  • Talk to NPCs about any game-related topic, engaging in fully dynamic conversations. 

  • Negotiate for better rewards, because why settle for standard quest payouts? 

  • Get personalized advice from NPCs. Not sure which path to take or how to build your character? They'll offer tailored guidance based on your progress, playstyle, and choices, helping you navigate the world more effectively.

Epitome is revolutionizing massively multiplayer gaming with our Next-Gen MMO Server, capable of hosting over 33,000 players on a single server instance—without sharding. This means cities are bustling, battles are epic, and every player's actions ripple through a truly unified world.

Explore densely populated environments where thousands of players interact in real-time, creating a vibrant, immersive community. From massive trade hubs to guild-led conquests, your presence in Epitome matters. With no artificial barriers, every encounter is meaningful, and large-scale battles unfold on a grand, shared stage.

Epitome evolves with and alongside you, the player. Your feedback directly influences our development process. We actively listen to and implement player suggestions to create an environment that encourages collaboration and fosters friendships. Join our community to help shape the future of the game and be part of an ever-evolving, dynamic world.

Powered by Unreal Engine 5.4, Epitome delivers breathtaking graphics and detailed environments, redefining the MMORPG experience. From lush landscapes to dynamic weather, a realistic day-night cycle, and uniquely varied maps, every aspect is crafted for a truly immersive adventure.


Your adventure begins by creating your character. Choose from three basic classes: Warrior, Ninja, and Shaman. Additionally, there are two advanced classes—Necromancer and Elementalist—which you can unlock later by developing your Morality Metrics in specific ways.

After selecting your class, decide where your allegiance lies: will you join the glorious Aria, who worship all the Archons equally, or the imperial Zetia, who acknowledge only the supremacy of Zethar and aim to overthrow the other Archons?

With unmatched strength, Warriors wield both light one-handed weapons and powerful two-handed weapons.

  • Path of the Body: Increase your damage with Sword Aura, trample enemies with Charge, and finish them off with the powerful Sword Vortex.

  • Path of the Soul: Focus on endurance with Spiritual Body, and use Spiritual Strike to cleave enemies in half.

Experts in cunning and camouflage, Ninjas are proficient with one-handed weapons, daggers, and bows.

  • Path of Assassination: Focus on quick, precise strikes. Use Shadow Trail to become invisible, then deliver critical blows with Ambush.

  • Tang Path: Specialize in poisons and confusion. Activate Mirage to create a decoy of yourself, or use Poison Scorch to spread a toxic cloud.

Masters of magic, Shamans use one-handed weapons and magical artifacts like bells and fans.

  • Path of Light: Support allies and yourself. Use Blessing to increase damage resistance, or deal a finishing blow to groups with Luminous Howl.

  • Path of Darkness: Cast curses to debilitate foes. Use Curse to increase damage taken by enemies, or summon a dark dragon with Summon Darkness to tear them apart.

Masters of death magic, Necromancers wield one-handed weapons and magical items.

  • Path of Blood: Use blood to activate abilities. Summon a Dark Knight with Dead Reckoning to fight enemies, or call forth a Great Ghoul to attract groups of foes.

  • Path of Decay: Manipulate decay energy. Activate Decay Infusion to charge your sword and deal damage over time, or use Rending Shadow to create a lance that pierces enemies along its path.

Elementalists harness the forces of nature, wielding both one-handed and two-handed weapons.

  • Arcane Path of the Ancient Elements: Focus on dealing damage. Use Infernal Breath to turn your hand into a flaming blaster, or activate Fury of the Winds to summon a tornado that damages enemies.

  • Arcane Path of Balance: Emphasize support and defense. Use Holy Protection to create orbs that heal allies and harm enemies, or summon aHydrosoul Guardian to defend you and attack nearby foes.

ext_user_account_notice: Epitome System Account (Supports Linking to Steam Account)
name: Epitome

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600K / AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 580 (6GB VRAM)
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: We really recommend using SSD if possible. These requirements are currently estimates. The final ones will be avaliable before the game's release.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-9700K / AMD Ryzen 7 3700X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 / AMD Radeon RX 5700 XT (8GB VRAM)
  • Storage: 40 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Definitely SSD. These requirements are currently estimates. The final ones will be avaliable before the game's release.

short_description: Welcome to the system of Epitome. Explore a world woven from the threads of reality.Here, us, the Archons, my creations, rule over their unique realms, shaping and disorting them according to their desires.This is no mere adventure - enter Epitome and strive to become an Archon.
supported_languages:
English*, German, Polish*, Turkish
*languages with full audio support
